rules.text: Racism, antisemitism, sexism, casteism, homophobia, transphobia, and harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Hostile and spam instances will be blocked.

Please feel free to mute (you don't see them) or block (they don't see you either) freely. If a hostile or spam user/instance appears, please submit a report to your admin. Report harassment immediately.
Fill out your profile when you join. When you follow someone, they should be able to see something about you.
Use the CW button broadly for shocking, potentially annoying, or repetitive content. Include a caption for all images. (Please do not ask others to CW experiences of discrimination.)
Don't post lists of users that they have not opted into, or repost content you see here on other sites. Avoid using asterisks or euphemisms, which get around people's blocked and muted terms.

In order to join this server, you should provide a brief explanation of why you are joining this particular server, not just why you are leaving another social media site. Why is c18.masto.host right for you?
